alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:20AM CST until January 12 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LEAKE...NORTHERN RANKIN...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT...EAST CENTRAL HINDS AND SOUTH CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 720 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ridgeland, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Madison around 725 AM CST. Fannin around 735 AM CST. Goshen Springs and Pisgah around 740 AM CST. Leesburg and Branch around 750 AM CST. Forkville and Ludlow around 755 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lena. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
